name: Drive Simulator - Tow Truck Transporter
description:
Drive Simulator - Tow Truck Transporter take to the controls of ultra realistic tow truck recovery truck in visually accurate equipment made by industry leaders.

Have you ever had the desire to become a tow truck recover truck operator? Now you can with Drive Simulator - Tow Truck Transporter. See the world though the eyes of a tow truck recover truck operator and experience accurate driving controls and beautiful scenery and worlds.

• Highly detailed models of truck equipment
• Powerful machines and stunning environments
• Advanced physics and interaction system
• Realistic graphics with accuracy to detail
• Tow and remove illegally parked cars
• Drive Simulator - Tow Truck Transporter 2019

If you like to clamp, tow and remove illegally parked cars? Drive Simulator - Tow Truck Transporter is for you! Sit behind the wheel of tow truck recover trucks and test yourself to see if you have what it takes to become the next top tow truck operator.
